In England, in the seven days to 25 December, there were 695,538 new confirmed cases (1,229.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 December, there were 523,438 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 33% (172,100 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 December is 10,828,575 (19,148.6 cases per 100,000 population).
